description: Harbinger of miracles, spiritual master MYNOO MARYEL has sparked a global movement of restoring dignity and enriching lives. She is an erstwhile advisor to key leaders and is on boards of several Fortune 100 companies in the UK; in her previous avatar as an entrepreneur and movie producer of Hollywood and Bollywood films, she achieved great success and realised she had lost herself along the way. Seeking answers, she experienced a series of spiritual awakenings and embarked on her journey into miracles.
name: Mynoo Maryel
